column2: I have learned about the elder races and view them as equals to humans.
Tolerance is the key to harmony.
Young [From.GetFirstName] seems to view all races as equal, lacking any historical perspective on the conflicts with the elder races.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] would like me to be less naive and make more efforts to actually help others.
column3: [From.GetTitledFirstName] souhaiterait que je tempère ma naïveté et que je fasse plus d'efforts pour venir en aide aux autres.
column4: [From.GetTitledFirstName] meint, ich solle weniger naiv sein und mich mehr darum bemühen, anderen zu helfen.
column6: A [From.GetTitledFirstName] le gustaría que tuviera menos ingenuidad e hiciera más para ayudar a los demás.

column2: I'm addicted to games - I like taking risks when I can win it all, even if sometimes it means loosing.
Young [From.GetFirstName] seems to be developing an addiction to gambling.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] does not approve of my addiction to games and decided to beat it out of me.
Humans are the superior race in this world.
Young [From.GetFirstName] is showing strong tendencies towards racist behavior.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] disapproves of my tendencies towards racism and has told me that I should show more ambition.
[From.GetSheHeCap] is in league with the non-humans!
